Title: How to Train Your Dragon Official Trailer [HD]
Comment: You know when I first heard about the first HTTYD right from the trailers I thought. Oh here we go again, the outcast kid who isn't popular who founds a pet who becomes friends and the kid has to hide the pet from the prejudiced parent, then the kid gets popular and then the misunderstanding and the painful forced liar's reveal scene comes in with the moping for 10-20 minutes, then everything is resolved at the end. Then 2 years after it came out, saw it on a bus, my mouth dropped at how mature it was, the characters are all likeable and their motivations are identifiable, the score by John Powell was incredible and then the animation which was a visual experience. The scene where Hiccup discovers that his leg is a scene most american animation never do and again, is well paced and touching. It's like Kung Fu Panda also. You cringe at the title and then when you actually watch the films, they draw you immersed with these characters, the the drama and the comedy.
